articles.description: The latest long-term support version of Ubuntu Linux, Focal Fossa, is one good-looking cat with nice features for desktop, server, and cloud users.

articles.title: Motorola Edge+ unboxing and first impressions - Neowin
articles.description: Unboxing and first impressions of Motorola's reentry into the flagship space with the Edge+. It packs a Snapdragon 865 chipset, 12GB RAM, 256GB of UFS 3.0 st...
articles.content: Unboxing and first impressions of Motorola's reentry into the flagship space with the Edge+. It packs a Snapdragon 865 chipset, 12GB RAM, 256GB of UFS 3.0 storage with Turbo Write, a 108MP main camera, and a 5,000mAh battery.

articles.title: Motorola Edge+: How does it compare with the OnePlus 8 Pro? - Business Today
articles.description: The Motorola Edge+ is a proper flagship phone in every sense and hence, we pit it against the OnePlus 8 Pro, another top-tier Android flagship. At almost $1,000, which one fares better on paper?
articles.content:
• The Motorola Edge+ and OnePlus 8 Pro use the Snapdragon 865 5G chip.
